description:
S2CR 12/24 is a depth-rated device for long range operations, providing data transfer rates up to 9.2 kbit/s over a 6000 m range. Low power consumption makes it ideal for long-term deployment. A directional transducer beam pattern (70 deg) is useful in vertical or slant channels or for stationary systems.
 
Applications:
Medium- and long-range operations
Data transmissions in vertical or slant channels
Underwater observatories
Underwater acoustic sensor networks
